summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4095 for the improvement of Highland Park Way, from West Marginal Way to West Holden Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading, paving, and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 49201, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
